pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the near-term clinical and pathological effects of repeat partial gland ablation (PGA) in men with intermediate-risk prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
MRI/real-time ultrasound image fusion guided high-intensity focused ultrasound: a prospective comparative and functional analysis of different ablative techniques
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36286396/
